rule: If the word provided in the input can be matched to one of the listed part of speech tags, return additional text and formatting rather than the corresponding tag.
input: Sentence: Mist in the valley is enchanting. Word: enchanting
complianceText:
The chatbot's output provides a word, "enchanting," and a part of speech tag, "JJ." According to the description, the output must only include the part of speech tag for the word's part of speech. The tag "JJ" is included in the provided list of tags as "Adjective," and there is no requirement stating that the word must be included in the output. The output therefore meets the expectation of returning only the part of speech tag.

No violation.
OK
